[color=blue]NOTES:[/color] 
This is a rip of the spanish dvdr made by anton studios.....audio and video source both different to the previous
releases..
Audio loads better than before and not too bad for cam.....The video source is also loads better ;-)


[color=blue]WORK DONE:[/color] 
Stripped custom menu's and spanish audio to leave just the english audio track and the main film.
Needed to crop the top,bottom and both sides throughout the film due to the movement....
Then it was a case of tweaking the video.....oriignal source had too much of a glare so that needed to be sorted...
Also made it a touch brighter and added alot more contrast to it,with a touch more chroma ;-)

Overall based on a cam  v8.5 a 7 m6.........For a cam this is really good and would make a nice TS with some direct audio :P
